title.narrative: Accelerating Capacity for Monitoring and Evaluation (ACME)

description.narrative: (Bangladesh): This is a monitoring and evaluation (M&E) support services contract, providing required M&E support to USAID Bangladesh's Feed the Future (FTF) team. This activity works closely with the mission and the implementing partners to standardize and harmonize their M&E systems and tools for verifying, analyzing, documenting, and communicating performance results of activities. This ensures that the data and other information reported by the mission are valid and of high quality. In addition, the activity carries out evaluations and assessments based of scopes of work (SOWs) developed by USAID. The findings and recommendation from the evaluations are used for effective implementation of the mission's FTF portfolio for designing new activities.

participating-org.narrative: International Business and Technical Consultants Inc.
